channel.title: The Lord of the Rings Characters
channel.description: List of characters from The Lord of the Rings

item.title: Frodo Bols√≥n
item.description: A hobbit from the Shire who carries the One Ring to Mount Doom.

item.title: Aragorn
item.description: A skilled ranger and heir to the throne of Gondor, he leads the fight against Sauron.

item.title: Legolas
item.description: An elven prince and skilled archer, member of the Fellowship of the Ring.

item.title: Saruman
item.description: A powerful wizard who becomes corrupted by the desire for the One Ring.

item.title: Sam Gamgee
item.description: Frodo's loyal companion, who supports him on the journey to destroy the One Ring.

item.title: Faramir
item.description: The brother of Boromir and a noble captain of Gondor, who aids Frodo and Sam.

item.title: Gandalf
item.description: A wise wizard who guides the Fellowship in their quest to destroy the One Ring.

item.title: Gimli
item.description: A brave dwarf and member of the Fellowship, known for his strength and loyalty.

item.title: Boromir
item.description: A noble but flawed warrior of Gondor, whose desire for the Ring leads to his downfall.

item.title: Gollum
item.description: A creature corrupted by the power of the One Ring, obsessed with retrieving it.

item.title: Pippin
item.description: A hobbit and member of the Fellowship, known for his curiosity and bravery.

item.title: Merry
item.description: A hobbit and loyal friend to Frodo, who plays a key role in the War of the Ring.
